x0 = 04030201
unpack: x0 => x1
x1 = { 0001, 0002, 0003, 0004, 0000, 0000, 0000, 0000 }
x2 = { 0002, 0002, 0002, 0002, 0000, 0000, 0000, 0000 }
x3 = x1 * x2
x3 = { 0002, 0004, 0006, 0008, 0000, 0000, 0000, 0000 }
x4 = { 00fe, 01fc, 02fa, 03f8, 0000, 0000, 0000, 0000 }
x5 = x3 + x4
x5 = { 0100, 0200, 0300, 0400, 0000, 0000, 0000, 0000 }
x6 = x5 >> 4
x6 = { 0010, 0020, 0030, 0040, 0000, 0000, 0000, 0000 }
pack: x6 => x7
x7 = 40302010

Press [Enter] to exit.
